title: Jandy TruClear — Display Readings & Error Codes

errors.title: Language on startup
errors.meaning: This acronym should appear during the 3-second startup screen.

errors.title: Language
errors.meaning: Language selected/available for the user. Output is OFF while selection is made.

errors.title: Standby
errors.meaning: System is ready and waiting for the next valid chlorination cycle without errors. Output is OFF.

errors.title: Connected to Jandy Automation
errors.meaning: System connected via RS485 to Jandy Automation, waiting for next valid cycle. Output is OFF.

errors.title: Connected to Jandy Variable Speed Pump (with controller)
errors.meaning: System connected via RS485 to Jandy VS Pump (with controller), waiting for next valid cycle. Output is OFF.

errors.title: Chlorination
errors.meaning: System is operating within a valid chlorination cycle without errors. Output is ON.

errors.title: Polarity reversing
errors.meaning: System is reversing polarity during a valid cycle. Output is OFF until cleaning completes.

errors.title: Low water conductivity
errors.meaning: System detected low water conductivity (possible cold water, low salt, or both). Output is OFF until condition clears.

errors.title: No flow or low flow
errors.meaning: System detected absence of flow while operating within a valid cycle. Output is OFF.

errors.title: Cell overload
errors.meaning: System running within valid cycle but detected a short circuit or overload. Output is OFF. Designed as a service alert.

errors.title: Cell open circuit
errors.meaning: System detected cell open circuit/disconnection. Output is OFF but retries every 30s. Designed as a service alert.

errors.title: Overheated controller
errors.meaning: Controller detected internal temperature too high. At 70°C, output reduced by 50%. At 80°C, output is OFF and error is displayed. Clears automatically when temp < 80°C.
